subject: Blacks
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar, whose fans are predominantly white and older than 50, has for years struggled to attract black drivers that would help it diversify its fan base and attract more sponsorship.
snippet: Nascar, whose fans are predominantly white and older than 50, has for years struggled to attract black drivers that would help it diversify its fan base and attract more sponsorship.
